notes.title: Authors’ contributions
notes.p: L.L. wrote the manuscript; G.S. contributed to the discussion of the results; Y.J. revised the manuscript. The authors read and approved the final manuscript.

sec.title: Authors’ information
sec.p: Y.J. is the Vice President of the Chinese Society of Critical Care Medicine, the President of Zhejiang Hospital, and first director of the Department of Critical Care Medicine, Zhejiang Hospital. L.L. and G.S. are the members of the Chinese Society of Critical Care Medicine.
